derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin eructatio(n-), from the verb eructare, from e- (variant of ex-) 'out' + ructare 'belch'

means.word_mean: 1. (of volcanos) pouring out fumes or lava (or a deposit so formed)
2. a reflex that expels wind noisily from the stomach through the mouth
